create record for each record in RecruitersGroup table where ProjectID is not null or exists related ProductsStock record where ProductId is not null 
or exists related [Kupat2].[dbo].Orders o on o.ProjectId>0 and o.RecruiterId = ps.ProductStockId or o.UserSource like Concat('recparam', STR(ps.ProductStockId))
*save the created id for Recruiter table
find created ProjectId by ProductId from related Kupat1.ProductsStock records, or by Kupat1.RecruirtesGroup.ProjectId

create record for each record in ProductStock table where ProductId is not null
or exists related [Kupat2].[dbo].Orders o on o.ProjectId>0 and o.RecruiterId = ps.ProductStockId or o.UserSource like Concat('recparam', STR(ps.ProductStockId))

create record for each record in Kupat1.Orders
where chargeStatus = 'OrderFinished' or DateCreated > DATEADD(month, -1, GETDATE())

find created ProjectItem.Id: if Orders.ProjectId>0 then if related Product is not Certificate : find projectItem of Project of type 5(FundDonation) , is it's Certificate - find ProjectItem of Project of Type 4(Donation), else if PrayerId>0 then find ProjectItem of type 3(PrayerName) of created project for this PrayerId . else if  ProjectId is null or 0 and PreyerId is null or 0 then take projectItem=1 - 'קרן קופת העיר'
if chargeCurrency is  null take currency, when ='₪' -> 1(NIS), '$'->2(Dollar), '€'->3(Euro),'£'->4(Pound), else else 1(NIS)
round(Total/(case when Payments = 0 then 1 else Payments end),2)

case when PaymentMethod='CreditCard' then 
                                (case when OrderLaguage='en' and ChargeCurrency = '£' then 1/*Stripe*/
                                      when OrderLaguage='en' then 3/*Authorize*/
                                      when OrderLaguage='he' then 2/*CardCom*/
                                          when OrderLaguage='fr' then 4/*PayLine*/
                                          else 22/*Other*/end)
                                  when PaymentMethod='PayPal' or PaymentMethod=' PayPal' then 5/*PayPal*/
                                when PaymentMethod='NedarimPlus' then 6/*Nedarim*/
                                --when PaymentMethod='' then 7/*Asakim*/ - todo: after API created
                                when PaymentMethod='AsserBishvil' then 8/*AsserBishvil*/
                                when PaymentMethod='Broom' then 9/*Broom*/
                                when PaymentMethod='ThreePillars' then 10/*ThreePillars*/                        
                                when PaymentMethod='Cash' then 11/*Cash*/ 
                                when PaymentMethod='Check' then 12/*Check*/
                                when PaymentMethod='BusinessCredit' and OrderLaguage='he' then 16/*Asakim Phone Credit*/
                                when PaymentMethod='BankTransfer' then 19/*BankTransfer*/
                                when PaymentMethod='BankStandingOrder' then 20/*BankStandingOrder*/
                                when PaymentMethod='Bit' then 21/*Bit*/
                                --when PaymentMethod='ManualCharge' then 
                                --when PaymentMethod='NedarimWithProblems' then                        
                            else 22/*Other*/end

cardToken

cardExp
cardNum,

create record for each record in Kupat1.Orders 
where IsNull([AnonymousUser],0) = 0 and (BillingCountry is not null or BillingCity is not null or BillingStreet is not null) .
 *Save the relationship between the Address.Ids and the OrdersID for use when inserting to the donations table

*Note (related also to Shipping Address - next table below)
- If the record is not associated with a UserId
o Its' address will not be combined with identical addresses from other donation records.
o the address for receipt will combine with the address for sending the note in the same contribution (if they are the same).
- Donation records of the same UserId - We will combine identical address records.

create record for each record in Kupat1.Orders inner join Products p on p.ProductsId=ProjectId where IsNull(p.[Certificate],0) = 1 and (CertificateCountry is not null or CertificateCity is not null or CertificateStreet is not null) . *Save the relationship between the Address.Ids and the OrdersID for use when inserting to the donations table

create record for each record in Kupat1.Orders if assoiate to UserId and contains address data
(Billing/Certificate)
where IsNull(UserId,0)>0 and
         IsNull([AnonymousUser],0) = 0 
         and PaymentMethod != 'NedarimPlus'
         and ((BillingCity is not null and replace(BillingCity,'*','')!= '') or (BillingStreet is not null and replace(BillingStreet,'*','')!= '')).
(and the same condition for CertificateCity...)
